name: KentuckyLottery
0:
”Alexa, ask Kentucky Lottery What are the Pick Three winning numbers”
”Alexa, ask Kentucky Lottery what the Mega Millions jackpot is”
”Alexa, ask Kentucky Lottery when is the powerball drawing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kentucky lottery
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Kentucky Lottery Skill provides jackpot amounts and winning numbers for your favorite Kentucky Lottery games. You can ask for information on the draw times and dates, winning numbers and information on your nearest Kentucky Lottery Retail location. You can also use this skill for resources on how to play games like Powerball, Mega Millions, Pick 3, Fast Play and more!
